short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you return to the top of the page in style!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses Tim Holman's Elevator.js library to add a fun yet functional "back to top" button to every webpage you visit. When you click it, it will scroll to the top of the page for you while playing elevator music.
